text: @TruthsOverTrump @joncoopertweets @NYGovCuomo Who's to say there's even going to be a Democratic National Convention this year. It wouldn't surprise me if they don't hold a convention due to the #coronavirus, which has killed over 80,000 people, but rather do something virtually, so as to not endanger anyone unnecessarily.
